verse: यं बह्मा वरुणेन्द्ररुद्रमरुतः स्तुन्वन्ति दिव्यैः स्तवैर्वेदैः साङ्गपदक्रमोपनिषदैर्गायन्ति यं सामगाः । ध्यानावस्थिततद्गतेन मनसा पश्यन्ति यं योगिनो यस्यान्तं न विदुः सुरासुरगणा देवाय तस्मै नमः ॥

ध्यानावस्थिततद्गतेन.तद्गतेन: with their mind fixed on him

overall_meaning: Salutation to that God whom Brahma, Varuna, Indra, Rudra, and the Maruts praise with divine hymns; whom the singers of the Sama Veda sing about with the Vedas and the supplementary texts in the correct order and the Upanishads; whom the yogis see with their minds absorbed in meditation; and whose end neither the gods nor the demons know.
